about_the_game:
A thrilling fusion of FPS and platformer gameplay set in a post-apocalyptic world!
Embark on an epic adventure as a robo-octopus, armed with incredible jumping, gliding, and combat abilities. Immerse yourself in the vibrant visuals inspired by the iconic 80s/90s era. Choose between "Simulation" or "Arcade" mode for a unique and challenging gaming experience.

Step into the year 199X, where the world lies in ruins akin to an anime apocalypse. Take control of a fearless tiny octopus robot and navigate through a Japan frozen in time. Your mission? Defeat the wicked Dr. Prometheus in this 90s-inspired action game, brimming with neon lights, laser beams, and miniature robots.


Features:

  • Polpo Simulator: Learn to soar through the skies with Polpo and master the management of his limited energy by collecting Pink Energy capsules.
  • Polpo Arcade Engage in a game mode where you can play without worrying about energy consumption and simply enjoy a nostalgic arcade-style experience.
  • 1990s Japan: Experience a whimsical reimagining of a world inspired by the anime and manga aesthetic of that iconic time period.
  • Point System: Enhance your skills in completed levels to increase your score and unlock thrilling new stages.
  • Single Player: Immerse yourself in a classic, old-school gaming experience with no multiplayer or online components. With 99% of the world's population gone, the internet is a thing of the past!
  • Defeat the Enemy Army: Engage in epic battles against bizarre and deranged drones alongside Polpo, but remember that every action drains energy.
  • Take Care of Polpo: Polpo is a small robot, so watch out for gusts of wind, electric cables, and radioactive zones that pose a threat.
  • Make Use of Kiosks: Exploit the functioning kiosks to enjoy music, acquire power-ups, and recharge your resources.
  • Customize Your Bedroom: Decorate your in-game bedroom with souvenirs obtained during your thrilling adventure.
  • Learn from Mey: Pay close attention to the wisdom shared by Mey as you progress through the game.

Be cautious, Polpo! Your mission awaits.

short_description: "Forza Polpo" combines FPS and platformer gameplay in a post-apocalyptic world. Play as a robo-octopus with the ability to jump, glide, and battle enemies while enjoying cheerful visuals inspired by the 80s/90s. Play in "Simulation" or "Arcade" mode and experience unique and challenging gameplay.
